entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , West Nipissing
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:41 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Rain, -0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Bay Airport 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Rain
Temperature: -0.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -3.2°C
Wind: E 24 km/h gust 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow with ice pellets mixed with freezing rain except rain over southern sections. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 this evening then becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early in the evening then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
